name: Hat Quest Shiny
description:
Made this in a week for the Pirate's Software GameJam, theme was 2 bit. I shoulda probably spent more time on this to get it finished, but it's at least playable.

At the momment theres one level to mess around in. It was fun learning how to make this and i'll try spend another week on this to finish it.

Hat Quest Shiny is about a goblin who loves his hats. Fight pesky, hat hording adventures in this top down adventure and claim all their hats as your own. 

Controls -

wasd - move

Space - Attack

R - restart level
